category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEShowSuppressedOccsDefaultState
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default state of the Show Suppressed Occurrences button or menu command when an application is opened or a new BOM window is created. The Show Suppressed Occurrences button is available in the Manufacturing Process Planner and Part Planner applications. The Show Suppressed Occurrences menu command is available in Multi-Structure Manager and Structure Manager. Valid Values: true - The Show Suppressed Occurrences button is on when the application is opened. false - The Show Suppressed Occurrences button is off when the application is opened.
